ygData.subject: Monk skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Good day all, I know that sneak is capped at 113, does anyone know what the highest levels we can take our other skills too? I think I remember reading that
ygData.messageBody:
Good day all,

I know that sneak is capped at 113, does anyone know what the highest levels we can take our other skills too?

I think I remember reading that the natual cap for skills is 200, but Dual Wield is at 250.

Can anyone confirm or deny this ?

Thanks,
Martin aka

Nyrkl Elmorak of The Companions
Member of the 31st circle of the Silent Fist
The Tribunal

--
Do not meddle in the affairs of sysadmins, for they are quick to anger and have not need for subtlety.

Martin.Steed@...
